mapper.sql: t.mark_id, t.product_id, t.product_type, t.product_name, t.theme, t.type, t.start_time, t.stop_time, t.req_count, t.vaild_time, t.price, t.share_url, t.limited, t.free, t.server_status
i.mark_id AS itemId, i.price AS itemPrice, i.specification_ids
mapper.insert: insert into t_teambuy_info (mark_id, product_id, product_type, product_name, theme, type, start_time, stop_time, req_count, vaild_time, price, share_url, limited, free, server_status) values (#{markId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productType,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{theme,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{stopTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{reqCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{vaildTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{shareUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{limited,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{free,jdbcType=BIT}, #{serverStatus,jdbcType=BIT})

mapper.update:
update t_teambuy_info
product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
product_type = #{productType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
product_name = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
theme = #{theme,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
stop_time = #{stopTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
req_count = #{reqCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
vaild_time = #{vaildTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
share_url = #{shareUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
limited = #{limited,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
free = #{free,jdbcType=BIT},
server_status = #{serverStatus,jdbcType=BIT},
where mark_id = #{markId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_teambuy_info set product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_type = #{productType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, product_name = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, theme = #{theme,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, stop_time = #{stopTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, req_count = #{reqCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, vaild_time = #{vaildTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, share_url = #{shareUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, limited = #{limited,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, free = #{free,jdbcType=BIT}, server_status = #{serverStatus,jdbcType=BIT} where mark_id = #{markId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select t.mark_id, t.product_id, t.product_type, t.theme, t.type, t.start_time, t.stop_time, t.req_count, t.vaild_time, t.share_url, t.limited, t.free, t.server_status, (CASE WHEN t.product_type = 0 THEN (SELECT price FROM t_link_item WHERE super_id=t.mark_id AND specification_ids=#{spcIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) WHEN t.product_type = 1 THEN t.price END) AS price from t_teambuy_info t where mark_id = #{markId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
